channel.title: Sp33chless - The New World is Old and Dying [A Journey Piece]
channel.description:
***The New World is Old and Dying*** - (A Journey) https://soundcloud.com/superlativerxns/the-new-world-is-old-and-dying/s-5p0uc - This track is supposed to be a dreamlike journey, where the feeling is never pinpointed, but it nonetheless carries you through a gamut of feelings and paths. Listen to it like you would a Pink Floyd album.
Let me know your thoughts, it’s appreciated.
